plays.text: Goal scored by Scott Thornton assisted by Mike Ricci and Niklas Sundstrom

Penalty to Krzysztof Oliwa 2 minutes for Elbowing Bryan Marchment
Penalty to Billy Tibbetts 2 minutes for Slashing Bryan Marchment
Penalty to Marcus Ragnarsson 2 minutes for Interference Kris Beech
Penalty to Alex Korolyuk 2 minutes for Slashing Darius Kasparaitis
Penalty to Dan LaCouture 5 minutes for Fighting JEFF JILLSON
Penalty to JEFF JILLSON 5 minutes for Fighting Dan LaCouture
